lead_paragraph: Steve Clifford has seen that look in Kemba Walker's eye. It tells the Charlotte coach to just give the point guard the ball and let him go.

headline.print_headline: Walker Drops 34, Hornets Defeat Heat 89-85 to Even Series
headline.main: Walker Drops 34, Hornets Defeat Heat 89-85 to Even Series

snippet: Steve Clifford has seen that look in Kemba Walker's eye. It tells the Charlotte coach to just give the point guard the ball and let him go....
